title: Protecting Yourself from Consumer Fraud
description: An exploration of common types of consumer fraud and practical strategies for protecting personal and financial information from scams.
learning_objectives: Identify different types of consumer fraud including phishing, spoofing, and identity theft
Recognize warning signs of potential scams and fraudulent activities
Apply strategies to protect personal and financial information
Understand consumer rights and resources for reporting suspected fraud
Develop skills to educate others about avoiding consumer fraud

skill_builder.title: Recognizing a Phishing Scam
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity where students analyze phishing scenarios and develop strategies for identifying and avoiding similar scams.
